titles.title: Hold me, Lord, in your arms

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hold me, Lord, (Hold me, Lord,)
In Your arms, (In Your arms,)
Fill me, Lord, (Fill me, Lord,)
With Your Spirit.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Touch my heart, (Touch my heart)
With Your love, (With Your love,)
Let my life, (Let my life)
Glor-i-fy Your name.
